column3: Traffic;Phnom Penh:------ A man drove his Highlander at speed into a central divider.------The incident happened at 11 pm on Tuesday
column6: in front of the entrance to Toul Kork Market in Village 16
column12: traveling along Highway 289 at a rapid speed. At the scene
column13: the car swerved to the left and slammed into the yellow and black concrete. Nobody was injured.------After the incident
column14: the competent authorities took the car away to await legal settlement. ------POST NEWS
